summary: An examination of the life and work of the revered and controversial photographer Robert Mapplethorpe.
cast: Nancy Rooney|Harry Mapplethorpe|George Stack|Robert Mapplethorpe|Philip Gefter|Fern Logan|Michelle Brunnick|Harry McCue|Lloyd Ziff|Frances Terpak|Sandy Daley|Edward Mapplethorpe|David Croland|Bob Colacello|Debbie Harry|Fran Lebowitz|Helen Marden|Brice Marden|Mary Boone|Joelle Shefts|Sam Wagstaff|Peter Berlin|Jack Fritscher|Carolina Herrera|Robert Sherman|Chris Stein|Carol Squiers|Paul Martineau|Holly Solomon|Marcus Leatherdale|Suzanne Donaldson|Tina Summerlin|Tom Baril|Britt Salvesen|Lisa Lyons|Patricia Morrisroe|Howard Read|Joshua Holderman|Peter Marino|Jack Walls|Ken Moody|Louise Bourgeois|Michael Stout|Brian English|Gloria von Thurn|Brooke Shields|Jonathan Becker|Janet Kardon|Dennis Barrie|Elliott Erwitt|Ed Koch|Patti Smith|Andy Warhol
title: Mapplethorpe: Look at the Pictures
